page.title: 11GREAT MEOLS:CLUBS,SOCIETIES.
page.content: {THE BOY'S BRIGADE-}Children attend on a Tuesday;6.30-8.00 pm.Their uniform consists of a blue jumper,blue hat, grey trousers and a wrist band for badges.Children may join at age 7{(The {Robins)}transfering at 9 to the junior section;at 11 to the seniors. Lead by Mr.J.Rogan, the members enjoy a variety of activities-snooker, table tennis,soccer and volley ball. The group has its own marching band. {THE SCOUTS-}"We go every Friday 7.30- 9.30 pm.The Scout Hut is in Mumford's Lane.The age group is from 10-15years. We go on various activities such as Abseiling,climbing,canoing,camping etc. Our uniform is black/brown shoes,dark trousers,green shirt and a crimson and gold neckerchief. The two leaders in charge are J.Fogg and J.Teague." {Stephen Flynn age 11.
